author: francis_destefano
post: Hi Dan and Richard! I have a few things to donate to Richard Orareo’s New Museum, including a snippet of the silk that once wrapped the Holy Shroud of Turin! I am also resolving to persuade the Redemptorists to move their materials about the Holy Shroud, currently locked up in a warehouse in Three Rivers, Massachusetts – to Richard’s museum as well!.
title: Richard Orareo, Shroud of Turin collector to open national shrine in Wabash, Indiana
